fields.title: Python Containers: Best Practices
fields.speaker: Daniel Herv√°s
fields.description: Previous basic knowledge on containers/Docker/containerfiles/Dockerfiles would be recommended.

fields.title: I want to deploy my Flask app on Kubernetes, what are my options?
fields.speaker: David Andersson, Javier de la Puente
fields.description: Some web application development experience, can be beginner.

fields.title: Coding Aesthetics: PEP 8, Existing Conventions, and Beyond
fields.speaker: Shiva Bhusal
fields.description: Just Basic skills and experience with Python programming language should be fine.

fields.title: Sync or async? Feel the magic of coroutines and the event loop in Django
fields.speaker: Antonis Kalipetis
fields.description: At least knowing how to code in Python. Knowledge of parallel or concurrent programming might help, but this will still be explained in the beginning.

fields.title: Architecture as Code (AaC) with Python
fields.speaker: Ruslan Korniichuk
fields.description: There are no prerequisites for attending this talk; everyone is welcome regardless of prior knowledge.
